name: Magneto

abilities.name: Shrapnel Blast
abilities.details: Launches collected metal debris as damaging shrapnel.

abilities.name: Magnetic Shield / Attraction
abilities.details: Hold: Forms a temporary shield of scrap metal. Tap: Pulls nearby enemies slightly towards Magneto.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.details: Levitates using magnetic fields. Consumes energy.

abilities.name: Metal Bind
abilities.details: Traps a single enemy in metal restraints, rooting them for ~2 seconds.

ultimate.name: Magnetic Vortex
ultimate.damage: 50 per second + High final pulse damage
ultimate.effect: Creates a powerful vortex of metal debris, pulling enemies in and damaging them over time, ending with a large burst.
ultimate.details: Unleashes the full power of magnetism. Lasts several seconds.

passives.name: Master of Magnetism
passives.details: Automatically collects metal scrap from the environment or destroyed objects. Scrap is used for Shrapnel Blast and Magnetic Shield.

lore: Max Eisenhardt, a survivor of the Holocaust, developed mutant powers to control magnetism. His experiences led him to believe mutants are superior and must rule humanity, often putting him at odds with his friend Charles Xavier.
